modName: Followers - Clarita Enita and Liria triplets
summary: Can't find a mod that has a hunter, mage, and warrior companions? Well now you have!
descriptionHtml:
=======DESCRIPTION=======

This mod includes 3 followers: Clarita - an intelligent mage, Enita - a stealthy hunter, and Liria - an all-out warrior. They're triplets, so they look similar. Clarita can be found in the Frozen Hearth inn in Winterhold, Enita can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun, and Liria can be found in the Winking Skeever in Solitude.

=======INSTALLATION=======

I think that using nexus mod manager will work for this, so I recommend doing that. If not, can someone tell me? I'll be able to fix it then :P

=======BUGS=======

If there are any bugs, report to me straight away. I need to know if this thing works.

=======GOOD MODS TO USE=======

The following mods are the ones that I used in the pics:

Coverwomen - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563/? - mrLenski
Covereyes - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4869/? - mrLenski
DIMONIZED UNP - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/? - dimon99
UNP Armour Replacer Package - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34102/? - MaddBomber83
author: Anyllus
